property.name: PERCEPTUAL
property.shortdesc: Gives priority to colors for which the human eye has greater sensitivity.

property.name: SELECTIVE
property.shortdesc: Gives priority to broad areas of color and the preservation of web colors; usually produces images with the greatest color integrity.

property.name: ADAPTIVE
property.shortdesc: Samples color from the spectrum appearing most commonly in the image.

property.name: RESTRICTIVE
property.shortdesc: Uses the standard 216-color color table common to Windows and Mac OS 8-bit (256-color or web-safe palette); ensures that no browser dither is applied when the image is displayed using 8-bit color.

property.name: CUSTOM
property.shortdesc: Uses a color palette that is created or modified by the user. If you open an existing GIF or PNG-8 file, it will have a custom color palette.

property.name: BLACKWHITE
property.shortdesc: Uses a set palette of colors.

property.name: GRAYSCALE
property.shortdesc: Uses a set palette of colors.

property.name: MACINTOSH
property.shortdesc: Uses a set palette of colors.

property.name: WINDOWS
property.shortdesc: Uses a set palette of colors.
